name: Google Meet Private Room
description:
The feature that I long for in online meet applications.


I was in the middle of a meeting on a very well known platform google meet a product by Google

, that was an all-team call but after some time people started talking to their specific teams that caused a bit of chaos; at that point of time I got a concept of private rooms inside a meeting, a concept of nested meeting, by which people with different agendas in a single meet can work in a tidy manner, this idea might help in reducing the time period of meetings as there will be multiple meets in a single meet, people with different agendas didnâ€™t need to wait for there turn to speak, they can create a private room and ask their teammates to join.


So I created this you can read more about the idea at medium .
